name: Diabolik Lovers: more.Blood - Limited V Edition
name_original: Diabolik Lovers: more.Blood - Limited V Edition
description:
Diabolik Lovers: more.Blood - Limited V Edition is an adventure game developed by Otomate. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by Idea Factory.
Diabolik Lovers: more.Blood - Limited V Edition is available on PS Vita.
